snippet: The facility, which will cost an estimated $9.2 billion, would have six runways and be capable of handling 120 million passengers a year.
abstract: Mexican Pres Enrique Pena Nieto is announcing construction of new international airport for Mexico City; new facility will have six runways and support 120 million passengers a year at a cost of $9.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: The facility, which will cost an estimated $9.2 billion, would have six runways and be capable of handling 120 million passengers a year.

headline.main: Mexico to Build New Airport in Capital
headline.print_headline: Mexico Says It Will Build New Airport in Capital
